resources.string: "This location had been connected ap，enable WLAN？"
This location is farway the location of connected ap，disable WLAN？
When enter location of connected ap with signal level 3 or higher and have GRPS data，enable WLAN
When faraway location of connected ap，disable WLAN

Binding of connected WLAN network, and later if you use 3G/2G GPRS data service in its coverage area, you will be remined to connect to this WLAN network or it will connect to this network automatically
Binding of connected ap.When enter this location,popup prompt
Binding of connected ap.When enter this location,auto enable
